title: Arab identity: who are the Arabs? (Episode 1)
creator_credit: Anthony Thomas and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Contrasts the diversity of one hundred and twenty-five million Arabs and the unifying power of their heritage. Shows the force of the Islamic faith as pilgrims throng to Mecca’s Great Mosque. Shows that four hundred miles to the North, Arab traditions are dying under political and Western influence.
